titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 268) setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal years 1989, 1990, and 1991 and against the consideration of such conference report.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-655.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/25/1988--Introduced. Waives points of order against the conference report on H. Con. Res. 268 (congressional budget) and against its consideration.
